summary: All four requirements appear to be implemented in the diff. REQ-1 (condensed card titles/descriptions with symbols and enlarged fonts), REQ-2 (tightened heading-to-paragraph spacing with mb-1), REQ-3 (reduced 'Luxury Botanical Atelier' font size by 2 steps in HeroSection), and REQ-4 (both WhatsApp numbers as clickable wa.me links in ContactSection and Footer) are all evidenced in the modified files.
